document.full_text: a man prosecutors say manufactured steroids at one of the largest underground steroid labs ever found in the united states and sold them on the internet was sentenced on monday to three years in federal prison.
document.title: man sentenced to 3 years in steroid distrubution case
lines_and_colors: a man prosecutors say manufactured steroids at one of the largest underground steroid labs ever found in the united states and sold them on the internet was sentenced on monday to three years in federal prison.
